room_title: Escape room "The Scarlet Scam" by Houston Escape Room in Houston
review: I went to the Houston Escape Room this past weekend to celebrate my birthday and we had a blast! Agent Apollo was great and really helped us newbies out with the Scarlet Scam! 10/10 would recommend

room_title: Escape room "The Scarlet Scam" by Houston Escape Room in Houston
review: Such a fun experience! Everyone should go here at least once!

room_title: Escape room "The Scarlet Scam" by Houston Escape Room in Houston
review: This place was so much fun. I've been wanting to try it since I heard about it. I love puzzles and games that make you think. It's like being in a real life video game. I didn't know what to expect but if you really get in to it, you'll have a ton of fun. Unless you go with a large group, you're at the mercy of the others in your group. We lucked out and everyone worked well together and we were able to escape Mo's Safehouse. But it was close. I can't wait to go back and try the other room.
